deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
creating a group of members for a specific tontine
   the creator of the group is added as the first member

because a member must be able to contribute via multiples little payments,
  we bind each payment to the member's cotisation and we increase the current paid amount
  We think the payment table isn't necessary, we can just match the amount to the "member cotisation"
  and consider it as payments
Functions to read datas from the Truffle Local Network

createGroup(uint256).notice: creating a group of members for a specific tontine   the creator of the group is added as the first member

createPayment(uint256,uint256).notice: because a member must be able to contribute via multiples little payments,  we bind each payment to the member's cotisation and we increase the current paid amount  We think the payment table isn't necessary, we can just match the amount to the "member cotisation"  and consider it as payments

listGroupOfTontine(uint256).notice: Functions to read datas from the Truffle Local Network
